name: Bugchelorette
description:
A bugs life can be full of danger. What could be the ultimate reward for such a harsh life? 

A beautiful partner to start a family with! 

Use your speed and mobility to get an advantage over the other suitors that try to impress the only "LadyBug" this side of the garden! 

There is no fair fights in a bugs life, attack your enemies from behind for extra damage!

And good luck you six legged hunk of a bug!
